Title: Tin Man is Down
Plot: Alleged Langley bomber Nick Brody remains at large. Saul plots a risky counterstrike on the terrorists connected to the bombing. Carrie becomes the focus of a hostile Senate investigation. Humiliated and abandoned by the Marine Corps, the Brody family struggles to cope with Dana's destructive behavior.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
